org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Positionable, Sizeable, org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Polygon, Rectangle, RegularPolygon, Triangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sizeable, org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Base class for shapes
